personalInfo.clubAffl: Paramount CC, New City, New York), Bear Lakes (West Palm Beach, Florida)

tourBios.carHigh: 2011: Made his Web.com Tour debut at the Nationwide Children's Hospital Invitational, shooting rounds of 75-74 to miss the cut.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Captured two victories in his career at Towson University...In 2009, was one of just 25 golfers nationally to qualify for both the United States Public Links and the U.S. Amateur... Won the 2010 Brae Burn Invitational in Purchase, N.Y., an event that draws top golfers from the New York, New Jersey and Connecticut areas.
tourBios.personal: Favorite teams growing up were the New York Giants and the New York Yankees...Favorite athletes are Derek Jeter, Tiger Woods and Victor Cruz...Biggest thrills in golf include playing in the Champions Tour's Nature Valley First Tee Open at Pebble Beach as an amateur and qualifying for both the U.S. Amateur and the U.S. Public Links.
